title: How to Clear Microsoft Calculator Using a Keyboard Shortcut

steps.title: Pressing Delete leaves the rest of the calculation intact.
steps.content: Pressing Delete leaves the rest of the calculation intact. Now the calculation is ready for a new entry as part of the calculation instead. Hit the delete key instead of using the mouse to click the clear button each time to save time.

steps.title: The Escape completely clears the log and the full equation.
steps.content: The Escape completely clears the log and the full equation. You'll do this when you want to start a brand new calculation.

steps.title: Backspace is helpful to fix quick typing mistakes.
steps.content: Backspace is helpful to fix quick typing mistakes. Use the backspace key to take out just one number to the left of the last number you are about to type.
